name: Planetary
description:
You have to defeat all the enemy planets :D

control : mouse

hi , my name is max , i developed the first idea of the game in just 12h , then i worked in the rest of the game and art about 12-24h more and here it is, a one click game :D, hope you enjoy it .

You have to download the free version to play it and Also supporting my work by paying 1 dollar or more and have some ingame benefits (not an easy game of course).

in the paid version you will have "DLC's" in an uncomming future, adding spaceships and other stuff.
